{"id": "9654", "title": "Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details", "description": "Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details have a duplicated name validation issue on the first page. Additionally, the first and second columns need to be merged.", "OB": "a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog appears, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears oversized for methods with many parameters.", "EB": "The dialog details should perform proper validation for duplicate names on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged.", "SR": "The preview gets cut off when changing a parameter name to something very long."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
